tips.title: üí° How does learning work?
tips.step1: Read the question and try to answer in your mind
tips.step2: Click to see the correct answer
tips.step3: Rate how well you remembered the answer (1-5)
tips.step4: The algorithm will automatically determine when to show the flashcard again
tips.step5: The higher the rating, the less frequently the flashcard will appear
